videos.headline: Western Michigan's RB finds the pylon for 32-yard TD catch
videos.description: Broncos' RB Jarvion Franklin edges out the Huskies' defenders to the end zone, landing Western Michigan their first TD against a scoreless Northern Illinois.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Western Michigan's RB finds the pylon for 32-yard TD catch) 2016/10/08 ESHEET
